website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech Wireless Gaming Headset G930 stands as one of the best wireless gaming headsets you can find, with high-quality audio output, smart design, and an impressive range.

customer_reviews.title: Brought this headset after was recommended by my best friend
customer_reviews.text: Brought this headset after was recommended by my best friend. Shipping was very quick, no complaints there. But the item itself wasn't great for me. The headset started crackling when listing to music, even on low volume. It also use to cut off when talking to people on Skype and take a while to reconnect or turn back on. I did get a refund for this headset as I personally wasn't happy bout it.
customer_reviews.author: Rian Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they break after a year. I've gone through 3 or 4 of these, costing me somewhere between £600 and £800. Amazing sound quality and mic. The signal range is a dice throw, some go further than others but they're generally quite good. I would urge people to find a different headset. As amazing as the G930 is, it breaks too easily. Supposedly the later iterations of Logitech's wireless headsets are just as flimsy and I can't imagine their wired variants being any less vulnerable.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mallaboro

customer_reviews.title: Logitech support even worse. For 2 months after purchase I couldn't actually ...
customer_reviews.text: Mic quality is just awful, Logitech support even worse. For 2 months after purchase I couldn't actually use half of "features" as Logitech app would crash on Windows 10. Also messes with Windows and sound card audio settings when app tries to override settings. Build seems very fragile, while comfy they feel a bit too cheap for that price. Audio delay is very small for wireless headphones, and they are good if you want to sit on a couch to watch some movies on PC/console. Battery lasts for few hours, however had to disable auto-shutdown in config file as they tended to turn off after 15-30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kalita

customer_reviews.title: Superb headphones
customer_reviews.text: These were a bargain too good to pass on a lightening deal. My husband had a pair already and bought another when these came up on the lightening deal (to use at work) the sound quality it's brilliant. They are comfortable the mic works well. Excellent headphones Edited to add, we have 2 pairs of these in the same room on different pc's and have no interference issues
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Plagued with problems.
customer_reviews.text: Massive pain in the backside ever since purchase back in Feb. Always disconnecting even when battery is still over half full. Sometime the volume dial just doesn't work in Win10. Software for the headset is bad. Constant driver issues. Writing this review while I'm the most frustrated I've been with this product as I cant even turn the thing off for some reason? Last Logitech headset I'll be buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It does have a tendency to disconnect from the USB dongle mid conversation (the connection light starts flashing whilst it recov
customer_reviews.text: The notification for battery status could be much more accessible via system tray. It does have a tendency to disconnect from the USB dongle mid conversation (the connection light starts flashing whilst it recovers) and it doesn't like it when you disconnect the USB lead to go wireless mid conversation either. I think given the pedigree, these issues shouldn't really exist but given the fact I purchased it with a very heavy discount, they can be somewhat forgiven as a result of the lower price. However, had I paid full, then would be sending back for a refund. I use these for work for VoIP mainly and they are comfortable to wear for long periods (6 hours plus).
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, will not register on computer
customer_reviews.text: Bad product, will not register on computer, gaming software will not recognise it however my mouse is recognised fine. Range on signal is bad. Mic quality bad. Audio quality is below average. Just recently after owning the product for SIX DAYS it has decided to have a huge buzzing noise when on and wont go away, if unplugged AKA wireless it will turn on for 3 seconds, buzz with the sound coming through then will shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and whilst the sound quality is wonderful, the construction is pitiful - the battery life ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned two of these in a row, and whilst the sound quality is wonderful, the construction is pitiful - the battery life (both it's actual charge capacity and the length of time before the battery literally -dies- and can never be charged again) is pathetic, The wireless constantly finds itself being interrupted by interference on the same frequency (great decision to have this thing work on the worlds most popular radio frequency for wireless routers there Logitech) The software that runs it never gives an accurate forecast of its battery-life, and oh yes - the speakers inside the headphones are prone to just randomly not working.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I think the headset is fantastic. Mild annoyances are far outweighed by the excellent quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Decent wireless range Comfortable for long sessions Usb (this is personal preference) Good audio quality Cons - Inconsistent battery life, sometimes lasts 15hrs, sometimes 8. Wireless sometimes loses connection even if it's within 1ft of the transmitter. Overall, I think the headset is fantastic. Mild annoyances are far outweighed by the excellent quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great, but crashes Windows 10 Audio servixe
customer_reviews.text: Great headset although often when I press mute it sometimes causes a loud crackling noise which result in my friends muting me from groups until resolved. The crackling/buzz noise is because of a service fault with 'Windows Audio' on windows 10 as even completely turning the headset off does not stop the noise. Update: Voice is now becoming "robot-y" very often, this is terribly hard to rectify as it seems anything I do on the computer or connection to the headset has no avail. Must be the headset itself on Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality and comfort of this headphone is quite good for its price
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for about a year, I can confidently write a review on this headphone. The sound quality and comfort of this headphone is quite good for its price. The wireless feature is also good and the programmable buttons can be customised for 'Push to Talk' functions like Teamspeak. However, the biggest downside of this headphones is that it suffers from repeated disconnection with the transmitter. A search on Google will show that many other users of this headphones have also encountered this problem, which to this date Logitech has yet to conclusively solve. Hence, I would advise against buying this. The repeated disconnections are very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: What can be faulted. Excellent when using Skype, playing games and very good when listening to MP3's. Not on par when listening to music from vinyl/CD for that I use my trusty Sennheiser HD 250 Linear II, but maybe I'm just being picky as I'm not really comparing apples with apples. The big plus for me was the freedom to move around the house/garden offered by these, especially whilst using Skype, and, when things get a bit tense when gaming just change the voice Avatar (Ii prefer the last option - chipmunk) and just say something like " Ermm - what's up doc" - cracks everyone up and gets a bit of a laugh
customer_reviews.author: GameAddict

customer_reviews.title: quality built but battery isn't good
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset as part of Amazon deals and for the real price tag I was expecting a good quality. The box the product comes in is a real nice box showing off half the headset and wireless adapter. The headset fits comfortably on my head after adjusting and the adjusters hold there position very well and the headband is secure and doesn't make your head sweat. But the battery life of the headset isn't that great and the app for the computer tells you you have 3/4 hours left of charge and 30 minutes later they turn off. Overall good quality build comfy but the battery isn't that good
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: An expensive paper weight
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst headset I have ever used and I wish I had done more research into this item before making my purchase. The headset keeps disconnecting and none of the solutions recommended have worked for me as it keeps disconnecting AVOID LIKE A PLAGUE, trust me the issues you face with this item is just not worth it especially for the asking price
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Dunno what everyone is complaining about
customer_reviews.text: I've used this headset for easily 6 months now & haven't had any issues with it. I smashed the headset in a rage late one work but they still work! Right ear has been hanging by the wire for about a month & it still works aha
customer_reviews.author: On Road

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched USB / Headset
customer_reviews.text: The Headset didn't come with the correct USB to match the headset therefore I couldn't use the product, the Logitech software doesn't seem to be able to pick up the product as well which makes it impossible to use as i'm able to adjust settings for my other Logitech products without any trouble. I'm in the process of refunding the product which is a shame because the headset is comfortable and would've helped with convenience during Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for me the problems started with very bad microphone quality
customer_reviews.text: You WILL have a myriad of problems, its not a "maybe" you will have problems its you WILL have problems, for me the problems started with very bad microphone quality, turning off every 15minutes (fixable but whoever at logitech decided its a good idea is an imbecile) and youtube videos not playing unless i disable and re-enable the headset (for some reason the headset breaks flashplayer) and then after 2 days of use the microphone lever breaks making it limp and not able to be put flat against the ear cuff, avoid this product like its the plague, listen to other reviews, its a horrible piece of equipment and you can find better products for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have super good internet and perfect fibre / no inteferences but ...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, when it works you are walking around the house, standing up, moving around your room not worried about wires. However its wireless, I have super good internet and perfect fibre / no inteferences but a lot of the time it would never connect or would disconnect or we make my voice "sound like a robot" in teamspeak. If it doesnt have perfect connection it will have static that you can audibly hear through your music or just sound faint, which is random, sometimes it doesnt some times it does, then boom 15 minutes of trying to reset it. When it worked it was amazing, but for £70 it was to inconsisten for me so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: GGZII

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality is poor in comparison sounds like your in a hydro foil ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a upgrade to my corsair vengeance 2100 also wireless , the sound quality is poor in comparison sounds like your in a hydro foil or something , they where slightly more comfortable tho , but put back in the box immediately even when the software was installed sound was lacking and I did not like having software running for a headset like why !!! corsair btr
customer_reviews.author: OnTheBubble

customer_reviews.title: Good range, power button could be bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Best headset yet. Strange to get used to being wireless but some nice little utils. So you can take the game with you around the house to get that much need drink! One drawback is the power button. Not the end of the world, but if you have big fingers, a tad fiddly. Does have a tendency to cut all of a sudden, but not for long and few and far between. I like this headset a lot. Not used all it's settings, but they're there if you need them.
customer_reviews.author: AL-B

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: Crappy headphones. I am a fan of logitech products but this one doesn't feel like part of the group. The quality of the headphones feels very cheep. The batter don't last long and I never managed to find the serial number to register it. I do not think that the headphones I received are legit. Would definitely not recommend anyone buying this. There are a lot better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Hristo

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Had these up and running within 2 mins - they are comfortable and block out 90% of external noise. My only criticism is the lack of ventilation - but its only a problem on hot days. A great feature is the boom microphone - when raised a tiny red LED lights up on the tip indicating that the microphone is OFF. This enables me to converse with others in the house without broadcasting it - or go to the bathroom without sharing the experience!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ian D. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my partner for his birthday and he hasn't taken them off. They work brilliantly and look nice on too. I shout for him for hours sometimes and he can't hear me at all so the external sounds are definitely blocked out well. Highly recommended from him! Maybe not so much from me ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Woods

customer_reviews.title: For a top-end product it is best avoided.
customer_reviews.text: OK for a couple of months...then both side bands cracked...held together with tape...then micro-usb port became far to loose so in the end had to tape the usb cable in place which kind of defeats the point of it being WIRELESS...For a top-end product it is best avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Green

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Been a gamer for over 20 years and these are the most comfortable headphones i've ever worn when gaming for long periods. Not great sound for watching a movie or music with alot of bass but for gaming the pitch is perfect. Bass and treble are perfectly mixed for gaming. From hearing footsteps to dialogue, distant gunfire to massive explosions. I've worn then for 8 straight hours and they never irritated me or hurt my ears. Cancels out almost all outside noise and keeps your sound in. (To the wifes satisfaction) Could not recommend these higher if i tried. Even the charge cable and dock is a smart touch. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but weak hardware
customer_reviews.text: While a very good headset with amazing sound quality and very comfy the charge port was very weak and brakes easily. My first set lasted several years before the charge port broke, the next set survived only a single month before the port broke making it unable to be charged, logitech was happy enough to replace this and sent out a new headset which again only lasted less than a month at which point i lost faith in this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant purchase. Very happy with item especially at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant purchase. Very happy with item especially at the discounted price. Although I had to buy a third party charging stand as headset tends to almost flop on to desk when not in use. Comfortable in use and very good sound and controllable side tone which is a must have.imo.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Clark

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS HEADSET!!!
customer_reviews.text: It does not work, I have only had problems since I bought it. It disconnects all the time, Refuses to charge, the software doesn't work, it stops 7.1 and reverts to plain stereo every time I play some music or do any second thing with sound. When playing games, the headset will disconnect as some games end (switching applications) and therefore causes spotify to skip through the songs until it reconnects. I have not got one good thing to say about this headset, please either get a wired one or wireless from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Connection drops, bad software with it
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you have any other wireless signals surrounding you cause otherwise you will be forced to use this headset wired all the time. I have bought steel series H after this and didn't have any interference from those. I cannot fault this for sound quality but for the heavens sake - trust me on this. in the above one or you will regret buying these. Invest more and buy better or settle for wired.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Balandis

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality. Poor buy
customer_reviews.text: constantly drops out which is annoying when watching a movie or watching youtube and it is with a irritating noise as it searches to get back. and the headset is poorly built. one ear piece has snapped within a year without being thrown around and when the headset drops out using the microphone it does a annoying sound to everyone listening. the G keys stopped working after a couple days use... it is good when it is working. giving great audio. but that doesn't make much of a difference when im sat here having to selotape the thing together because the poor build
customer_reviews.author: glen ford

customer_reviews.title: However don't get me wrong I think that when it works it is amazing. Even from out the box I had issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think they headset is a bit disappointing. However don't get me wrong I think that when it works it is amazing. Even from out the box I had issues with the headset connecting and holding a connection. These issues never go away either. Battery life is ok, however shortly after having the headset the charging port has become loose - therefore only charging if the cable is in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Good, but very problematic
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, these are great headphones, they have a decent range, good microphone and speaker quality but on occasion they crackle and cut out. The battery life is also rather low in comparison to other wireless headsets.
customer_reviews.author: james cambridge

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, the surround sound has very good sound but somtines it cuts in and out to stereo. Tried contacting Logitech but their customer service is TERRIBLE! All of my computer peripherals are Logitech but they do not provide any kind of customer service. I spent hours trying to find a way to report this problem I was having.
customer_reviews.author: andrew kirby

customer_reviews.title: Eventually put mine in the bin!
customer_reviews.text: Constant issues with this headset, including the buttons and volume control not working until a computer reboot (Both Win7 & Win10). Biggest issue and the reason they ended up in the bin is because of the constant disconnect and reconnect when listening to anything online. Fixes online include dismantling the USB key or installing older software but nothing worked. Little support from Logitech - wouldn't purchase a headset from them again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Audio quality is good, but microphone sounds a little bit crappy
customer_reviews.text: Logitech Gaming software is very unreliable and does not work properly on Windows 10. Microphone keeps falling down, and I need to screw it every two weeks :/ Works on Linux, there's no official support but it works and it even shows battery percentage using certain software. Audio quality is good, but microphone sounds a little bit crappy. I like this headphones, they're so comfortable. I've got it very cheap but they're not worth official price.
customer_reviews.author: pajadam

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one and still happy
customer_reviews.text: Second one I've had, first one lasted one year and then one of the earcups went dead. I use this headset about 12-13 hours a day and love it, great sound and even better wireless range. Not giving this a 5 due to one of the earcups going dead after a year however it got replaced almost instantly thanks to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: Bad design? Worthless headset.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headset for a while and have finally had enough of the constant disconnects and interference that I've been experiencing since day one. I don't know if it's poor design or if there is just so many devices using 2.4Ghz band but this headset is plagued by static, buzzing, cross-talk and almost constant disconnects. As a gaming headset, the point is to be able to communicate with other players but that is almost impossible when it disconnects 4-5 times in a row every few minutes. Terrible headset.
customer_reviews.author: Syphonuk

customer_reviews.title: So much promise, much disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for less than 2 months with not too many problems (some random disconnections) until sound interference became a huge issue. Moving my head even just slightly would lower the sound significantly. So frustrating because when the headset worked properly it was comfortable, good sound quality and the battery was decent. I've moved on to a different headset now and while I'll miss the wireless aspect, I won't miss random disconnections and then the terminal issue.
customer_reviews.author: J. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: As a buyer of this headset I can say it is the best one I have ever invested in. with a 7.1 surround sound option I cant help but smile every time I hear something in a game or in a song. Previously I used the g430 and the material was very flimsy and broke on me but I don't think that will be an issue as the material on these g930 Feel, look and are very durable. The sound produced from this headset is unreal, it is easy to use / understand and setup. Worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed because I've always been a fan of Logitech products ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for only two months and it has started failing. A full charge now only lasts an hour or two and even then I'll randomly get this incredibly loud buzzing noise. Often as loud or louder than the game I am playing. Making it difficult to concentrate. Unfortunately this has started after the return window ended so I cannot return. Really disappointed because I've always been a fan of Logitech products they've always done me well. But this headset is too expensive to breaking after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. S. Huggett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for gaming and after two hours or so they begin to feel heavy on my ears and it's a relief to take them off. But the quality of sound is good and speech over the microphone is clear. So I use them for short sessions, but will have to find something lighter for those gaming weekends.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound and immersive surround
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected from Logitech and a lot more that I had only hoped for. The sound at all levels is clear and responsive and the surround effect is very immersive. The only minor gripe is that the headset is a little tight but I expect that this is just the head band wearing-in. Superb purchase a really happy. Music sounds live and games are even more enjoyable. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Rough Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for the ps4!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as the description states that it is pc and playstation 4 compatible but it's not until you unbox And read the instructions that it's for pc only (surround sound ) ps4 is only in stereo and the volume is very low with no way of turning up the volume so in other words is it set to one level only so i recommend this for the pc only.
customer_reviews.author: darren bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Looks ok - got a quality feel to it - sound is good but everyone moans about the mic quality to me
customer_reviews.text: Big on the ears and head, short range, windows can become confused as to what sound goes where. So it will play music through HDMI and speech through the headset. Looks ok - got a quality feel to it - sound is good but everyone moans about the mic quality to me.
customer_reviews.author: Umpa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Simply Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headset, 10/10, slightly large but apart from that, no faults at all, microphone and sound are perfect, best headset on the market at the moment by far! I love using them everyday, very comfortable though the ear cups get a bit warm around my ears, but yes a brilliant product with only minor asthetic details which can easily be rectified. :D
customer_reviews.author: Jamie (:^.^:)

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones I've had
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones, battery live is around 7 hours and it takes 2 hours to charge back to full. Sound quality is very good and so is the reception. I haven't tried it too far from computer because my flat is tiny but it works everywhere on my flat. You can use it while charging with the cord on it. The mic is clear as everyone I've called can hear me ok, also everyone on ventrillo could hear me ok too.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cavalcanti

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really loving these headpones! Gets really good range! my pc is on 2nd floor and i can go all the way to the kitchen on ground floor! comfortable, good sound, easy setup, long charging dock cable
customer_reviews.author: Laurynas Ulevicius

customer_reviews.title: These headphones were great for the first 12 months
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were great for the first 12 months. However, the USB charging port is now unreliable and recent software updates have made it prone to disconnecting, not connecting to my PC to begin with, and randomly turning off and on again. The physical unit is sound and the quality of playback is excellent, but the sheer amount of hassle I have gone through on the software side means I would not buy another and would warn any potential customer to avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Labyrinths

customer_reviews.title: Expected a flawless product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good, apart from reconnecting every 15min (and going sillent for 5 seconds while it happens) Edit: Having more and more "disconnect and reconnect" issues lately. I wouldnt recommend buying it for its silly price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor response but clear
customer_reviews.text: Not great range, required some pretty significant EQ to get them sounding ok. Glad to say there was no wireless compression noticeable, unlike more expensive headphones. They hold up in 2017
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, no discomfort after wearing it on your ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, no discomfort after wearing it on your head for hours. The sound quality is very good both the speakers and mic. For the cost, its a very useful headset. Works so well with my ps4, no issues whatsoever with my console. Only thing that can be annoying is the power button. It is somewhat indented and can be a pain to click in to turn off sometimes. But its such a minor niggle, apart from that, for the value, its really good.
customer_reviews.author: Choowhee

customer_reviews.title: Described on the PS4 as "The G930 headset works with ...
customer_reviews.text: Described on the PS4 as "The G930 headset works with your PlayStation 4 in stereo mode. Experience chat, voice interface and gaming audio in rich, detailed sound.." The only items correct is yes it work on the PS4 in stereo mode but at such a low volume level its debatable whether these are even true.
customer_reviews.author: Neon

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cans - thought they were broken as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cans - thought they were broken as they kept turning themselves of randomly but its a Windows 10 thing easily fixed by disabling the auto shutdown feature, google is a great help for troubleshooting. Had a set of these before and tried another brand but was sorely disappointed so went back to these - best headphones I have had.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Completely awful... dont buy it,
customer_reviews.text: I bought thisa while ago and had issues from the start in terms of connection issues to it not simply turning on to loud screeching audio ever 5 minutes. It has died on me completely and I am honestly astounded how they can charge so much for one of the worse headsets I have ever used, its honestly a joke. Also good luck with any help if you live outside the U.S because the spare parts can only be bought from there and you can only live chat with someone if your from the U.S. Literally the biggest waste of money I think I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset.
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset on a deal and I love it. Could not be happier with it. Was worrying about the purchase after hearing they are flimsy but I have not experienced this. The battery is good, only ever charge it every other night. Would purchase more from Logitech after this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this headset
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset, I bought this for a friend when it was on offer after using my own one for the last 3 years or so. Wireless almost makes it all the way into the garden ans battery life us great, usually only needs charging once a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Harper

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Is simply fantastic. Very comfortable with great audio quality on both speakers and microphone. My computer is very loud and this microphone does a great job of canceling out the noise. The range on the wireless allows me to move all around the house while speaking to people or listening to music. The battery life is nice and long, more than enough for a gaming session. With the right drivers, the headset will give you a beep when the battery is at 20%. Would, and do recommend. The only downside is it can sometimes be a little more difficult than you'd expect to turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: All perfect now. Very comfortable with good clear sound
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a replacement for a wired set of headphones which had begun to fail. They were purchased predominantly for gaming but also for conference calls when working from home. The only drawback is a bug with the configuration which switches off the headphones every 15 minutes when used wirelessly. A quick google found the fix, which involves updating a config file. All perfect now. Very comfortable with good clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Worsy

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: As usual logitech have built a brilliant product. The audio quality through the headphones is first class and the microphone does a brilliant job of capturing my voice without all the background noise.the included software is perfectly reasonable and the voice changing software is a lot of fun. Best and maybe surprisingly of all the batteries on the headphones last a really long time and even if you should somehow need to wear them whilst charging then the included USB charger is well right out for use whilst it charges.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Moss-Woodward

customer_reviews.title: good hardware, bad software
customer_reviews.text: the hardware it's self is okay, but the latest Logitech gaming software for it is terrible, it keeps disconnecting. There are two fixes for this: either don't use the gaming software or use an older version of the software that works (the version that works for me is version 8.35.18)
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Connection to the usb is dreadful rarely connects if not plugged in through the wire even if it has been on charge for 5 hours. It will disconnect from time to time and cause a sudden loud burst of static noise which can be deafening. It's great when it works and it is comfortable, but because of these problems it makes it for a 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesbasshaw

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit frightened after reading some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit frightened after reading some of the reviews, but my unit preformed flawlessly right out of the box, no disconnects and no sound issues. i also just downloaded the latest version of the driver suite and im running win10 64bit
customer_reviews.author: gilad levy

customer_reviews.title: audio quality wasn't bad during its lifetime and the Mic was good
customer_reviews.text: Wireless is a positive, battery life lasts about 10 hours, but the frame of the headset is cheap. From regular use, only fitting and removing the headset over time, the frame on the speakers began to crack and break to the point where it has now fully broken after just a year. On the plus side, audio quality wasn't bad during its lifetime and the Mic was good, shame about the framework quality and software bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Andrews

customer_reviews.title: now that I have it I couldn't be happier about buying it
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning I was kinda scared to buy it, this was because of all these problems that other people talked about, and also because I don't know about the 3 year warranty thingy that it comes with and how it works with Amazon. But, now that I have it I couldn't be happier about buying it. The sound quality is AMAZING. I listen to music on it all the time. just overall amazing The only thing is that it is a bit uncomfortable after long hours, but it's nothing that breaks your neck, it just gets a bit tight after a while and it will loosen up over time, but apart from that, amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Galhanas

customer_reviews.title: Only purchase if you don't want to use it for more than 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset on the 3rd August after reading many reviews. Seemed to be the right choice for a decent headset at a decent price. Fast forward 5 months and after moderate use the Headset no longer chargers, or turns on. It is outside of the Amazon 30 Day return policy and so seemingly nothing that can be done. Avoid at all cost, as I'm certain you won't want to be replacing a near £100 headset twice a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... due to constant breaking up and crackling because to stupid Gaming Software and terrible drivers
customer_reviews.text: Returning due to constant breaking up and crackling because to stupid Gaming Software and terrible drivers... Headset themselves are great but with such dodgy software and no other way of using them wihout it (other than no surround sound or use of program buttons which makes a £80 set of headphones the same as a £1 set) utterly useless.
customer_reviews.author: Duckboy

customer_reviews.title: THe wired version is still better it seems as this has the same faults as ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly keeps turning itself off It only runs when there is sound but sometimes to doesnt realise that there is sound and turns off, and you have to turn it on again and again and again. Seems to be a common problem. THe wired version is still better it seems as this has the same faults as that but with a few more besides!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Got them for around 50 and was very impressed. I was a bit worried about some reviews that said they were buggy to set up and get working. Not my experience. Plugged in the USB and the wireless paired straight away with 7.1 surround sound. Battery life is about 6 hours
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Decent headset, not great mic
customer_reviews.text: Decent headset, decent audio quality and good surround sound, good build quality, but the mic isn't great and by default the headset turns itself off every half hour. That was solved by editing some config files though. I also had a problem where the headset would disconnect and reconnect every now and then, but switching the port where the dongle was connected solved that too. All in all, good headset, not amazing, and the mic could be a lot better. Wireless is pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: Callum

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother. There's an ongoing problem that causes the ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. There's an ongoing problem that causes the headset to randomly disconnect and reconnect. I have the receiver less than a meter from my head and it happens 8 or 9 times an hour. The mike is fairly low quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headset! Easy to get used to because it's comfortable and the quality of the headset and headband is very good. The microphone quality is brilliant and the sound quality is perfect. First charge got me 9 hours of use and it's easy to charge on the hub it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Beag

customer_reviews.title: Good headset for a couple of years use.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is acceptable for the price. Reaches pretty far, 2 rooms away at least. Microphone is pretty low quality. If dropped too many times / extensively used for a couple of years, it will break in the area shown in the provided picture. DO NOT DOWNLOAD ANY DRIVER SOFTWARE FOR THIS ITEM. They're all awful. Stick to windows drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These headphones are the business. The range and battery life are excellent. I've seen reviews about how these are supposed to be bad. Well, if you go into the software for these which you can download from the logitech website, turn down the subwoofer to something like 3 or 4, which is set to maximum (11) and tinker with the equalizer profile which is not preset then you will find they are the best headphones you are ever likely to own.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Use them every day great product. The only issue is that sometimes the ...
customer_reviews.text: Use them every day great product. The only issue is that sometimes the mic goes into power saver mode and is hard to turn back on sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: DanDan

customer_reviews.title: great headset, acceptable wireless range
customer_reviews.text: great headset, acceptable wireless range, just about the battery, after many charging times, it start to drop quicker than the first time, but it is okay, i am a heavy user indeed. generally i love it, also u should handle it carefully (talking about metal)
customer_reviews.author: Hani Hegazi

customer_reviews.title: Headphones wireless
customer_reviews.text: This product is brilliant , I use on my computer and Xbox , value for money . Overall very happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must agree the software could be better. Mainly because of the battery monitor
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews i was a bit scared. But still bought it and have no regrets. Must agree the software could be better. Mainly because of the battery monitor. The numbers are a bit random. Other than that sound quality is very good. Only time connection was lost is when i was 2 flors down from the dongle. Battery holds long enough depends on the volume and bass settings. In my case 8-11hours. Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: denis

customer_reviews.title: Probably The best headset i have EVER bought
customer_reviews.text: Probably The best headset i have EVER bought, provides exactly the same as the Logitech G430 but without wires. definitely reccommend to any PC gamer that is sick of being tied to the computer every time you want to get up and walk. very comfortable when on the head. Also not even very heavy at all for a wireless headset.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lrobertson

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G930 Wireless Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: I had the G930 for 3 years until the battery died. I was extremely happy with the performance and battery life so I purchased the same model from amazon. I could had only replaced the battery but they were pretty worn out, so I decided to buy new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Yiannis

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset, terrible software.
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech all in one gaming software is awful. After you buy this the first thing you'll do is start Googling how to fix all the irritating quirks, which can be done, editing XML configuration files etc but it's just a pain and shouldn't be the responsibility of the customers to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Michael P Frise

customer_reviews.title: Great product once you fix the auto switch off!
customer_reviews.text: Great headset and prgramable buttons I setup to answer calls and pause/play and skip tracks. Only problem is you need to edit an XML file to stop it switching off after 15 minutes, simply google it and watch the video on youtube and the fix is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Tiffen

customer_reviews.title: Avoid. Poor quality radio, frequent disconnections.
customer_reviews.text: Frequent disconnections during use. There is something wrong with the radio in this design, no wonder it was so cheap. Fit is perfect, functionality is good, mic is good. But none of this matters when they keep disconnecting.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Three Positives and only one Negative
customer_reviews.text: The G930 Wireless Headset from Logitech is a great headset in everyway its comfortable, high quality surround sound 7.1 Dolby, Nice Mic stows well upwards out of the way and retractable boom clip on the side of your head. Thats the positive side of the product. The Negative side of the Product is the two Speakers it is high quality but is it not loud enough to convince me in any way so it is why I choose 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but sent back as not compatible with Xbox,my mistake but they were very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected. Works on Fedora 21 out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good quality sound, works out of the box in Fedora. The battery lasts quite long. The dongle to recharge the headphones is also very convenient: the cable is so long it can be used plugged without a problem, and the additional USB port allows placing the receiver virtually anywhere. Also, the way the cable can be rolled around is very smart, keeping it as short as wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Losilla

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first, but they've stopped working. I only bought them a couple of months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Sound qualitt is great but I suggest getting the wired version
customer_reviews.text: Sound qualitt is great but I suggest getting the wired version. Battery doesnt hold for too long and sometimes the USB cable needs to be reconnected couple of times before it starts to work when you switch between them and speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha123

customer_reviews.title: 12yr old loves headphones
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my 12 yr old son who rated it 4/5. Not a 5 because the wireless connection is a 'bit fiddly' / intermittent. Otherwise he loves it and uses it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jools

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for multiple games
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame, these headphones don't work for a couple of games I bought them for. Don't know why you can still buy these, they don't work, just look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lillico

customer_reviews.title: This headset is one of the best I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This headset is one of the best I have ever had, a full charge can last for 5 hours, granted it sometimes (rarely) does a micro disconnect and connect, its very brief and rare as I said, but hey, its wireless! (good for those moments u need to get a refreshing drink or sandwich from the kitchen)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good a bit temperamental in windows 7 but been OK in windows 10
customer_reviews.author: SteveF

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Your better off getting a wired head set or separate headphones and mic
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but on 'special' = cheaper than competitors ...
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap, but on 'special' = cheaper than competitors. I concur with other Reviewers high praise - if my son's feedback is to go by. Test of time awaits time ...
customer_reviews.author: THORK

customer_reviews.title: Too many problems
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality, in general, is good, but the problems that come along with this headset make it not worth buying. It has A LOT of static and intereference problems, as you may read in lots of websites. On some days it may be functional the whole time, but on others it will disconnect and reconnect every 5 seconds or so. It is very annoying. It's a bit heavy but still somewhat comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound but horrible matieral.
customer_reviews.text: As much as the sound is very good and the earcups are comfy as well as noise cancelling... The matieral of the headset is really weak, my dog decided to become Spider-Man and in the process knocking my headset off my desk. Resulting in one of the earcups' arches to snap off - enabling the product useless.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: very annoying and I end up using a built-in laptop mic
customer_reviews.text: I keep having problems with it, it keeps disconnecting every couple minutes for no reason or shutting down even on full battery, very annoying and I end up using a built-in laptop mic instead
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: No problem like other buyers
customer_reviews.text: No problem like other buyers. Mic very clear and battery life last a good 6+ hours. Only problem is that sometimes there is little static on the left side when charging and in use at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Martin S.

customer_reviews.title: 1 year and broken
customer_reviews.text: Just over a year of ownership it no longer charges.
customer_reviews.author: Simon J S Perry

customer_reviews.title: headphones for hard-core gamer
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable set of headphones hardly noticeable when wearing them especially if you're hard-core gamer playing for three or four hours
customer_reviews.author: Zig-Zag1269

customer_reviews.title: Disconnection issues.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but flimsy, sent mine back after a month due to randomly disconnecting from my PC and PS4, tried fixes suggested online but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rafferty

product_meta.title: Logitech Wireless Gaming Headset G930 w/ 7.1 Surround Sound Wireless Headphone
